sql:
SELECT
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  i.i_category,
  i.i_class,
  i.i_current_price,
  SUM(ss.ss_ext_sales_price) AS itemrevenue,
  SUM(ss.ss_ext_sales_price) * 100 / SUM(SUM(ss.ss_ext_sales_price)) OVER (PARTITION BY i.i_class) AS revenueratio
FROM store_sales AS ss,
  item AS i,
  date_dim AS dd
WHERE
  ss.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk AND i.i_category IN ('Books', 'Shoes', 'Electronics') AND ss.ss_sold_date_sk = dd.d_date_sk AND dd.d_date BETWEEN CAST('1998-03-21' AS date) AND CAST('1998-04-20' AS date)
GROUP BY
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  i.i_category,
  i.i_class,
  i.i_current_price
ORDER BY
  i.i_category,
  i.i_class,
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  revenueratio;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(dd i ss)
 MergeJoin(i ss)
 BitmapScan(dd)
 SeqScan(i)
 IndexScan(ss)
 Leading((dd (i ss))) */
